phrases: Do you really think you will be able to kill Yin when you find her?
Why did you save her the other day?
They are trying to get far away.
I will leave it to you.
Does your power always have to be so extravagant?
It is more like La traviata than it is Aida.
In that case, I will explain it to you seriously.
so when I hit them with their vibrational frequency, they will begin to resonate.
In other words, the vibration is amplified to the point of destruction.
In any case, that is what my ability is about.
That is why I can destroy any object I want,
even the most obscure of things.
Yeah, and the original chestnut glutton rice, harvest rice kokeshi doll, and...
We also need to buy something to eat.
You are on the job, you know.
What are you going to do if you get drunk?
I fall asleep whenever I get drunk.
No, that is not the issue.
Why do not you want to go home, Kirsi?
Are not you happy about going back to your homeland?
Kirsi, how do I say this...
You are not the same person I once knew.
I heard there were many people who became like you after a certain point in time.
I tried to find you whenever I was on tour abroad.
Mr. Kastinen, about the money for our expenses...
I knew you were going to say that.
Look at the guy next to the cop who is inspecting everyone.
He is trying to trace the connection I am transmitting.
It might have been a little too late.
Was that one of your abilities?
I made his heart vibrate sympathetically, which made it come to a halt.
My remuneration will not change, regardless of whether it is spectacular or not.
We only know that much right now.
I am continuously receiving information from our superiors.
Can you find out where she is at any time?
It means that no one can escape the grasp of the syndicate.
If people like you were not associated with us, you would probably be a bunch of serial killers or renegades.
Be grateful you are on our side.
My ass is on the line, so hurry up and go after her.
There needs to be water nearby.
That is a tough remuneration you have.
To tell you the truth, it does not have to be cigarettes.
Anything will do, as long as I put it inside my mouth and spit it back out.
It is a habit from your days as a human, is not it?
It looks like luck's on our side.
We will be stopping to allow the oncoming train to pass.
The delay will be approximately five minutes.
Kirsi, are you sure someone is...
Now is not the time to be sleeping!
You could have at least watched over them while I was using the toilet!
We are getting off at the next station!
No, you cannot touch me there...
What are you taking pictures of?
I am going to find something to burn.
Episode Fourteen A Heart Unswaying on the Water's Surface... (Part Two)
I had a daughter in the past.
I broke up with him shortly after she was born.
Even though I was a singer, I was a heavy smoker.
I stopped smoking while she was in my womb,
but I should have stopped for good.
I carelessly left a cigarette somewhere within her grasp.
She put it inside her mouth.
Before I realized it, she had already choked to death.
I wept for the next several nights.
Before I knew it, the night sky had changed.
Why did you save her the other day?
You were thinking about that night, were not you?
I think I know why you do not want to go back.
You have sad memories of your homeland, which is why...
Is not that what it was?
The sadness, as well as everything else...
If I did not run outside that day, Mama would not have died.
Ever since that night, it disappeared...
Bearing the sins of the children of Earth, the moon begins to consume its light.
It might have been a stanza from an aria.
They say that a lunar eclipse is a symbol of atonement.
In that case, the moon must be in a perpetual state of atonement, since it cannot be seen anymore.
You are a strange contractor, too.
There was not anything going on between your mother and me at that time.
You noticed it after all, did not you?
The feelings I always kept inside of my heart.
Guilty thoughts about stealing your mother away.
I wanted to tell you one thing.
You do not have to feel guilty about it, Kirsi.
I swear I have seen you before.
I saw you at the construction site when it collapsed.
Are you the stalker who is after the girl?
This is something you should not be involved in.
Do not screw around with me!
What did you do to that girl?
She is really quiet and does not show many expressions.
It is like she is some kind of doll!
Even if it does not show in her expressions or her words, she is crying within her heart.
There is not a single person in this world that deserves to be treated like a doll!
What are you people up to?
Did you run away on your own?
I thought my soul would be able to move forward.
Is she being chased because of you?
Are you her partner in crime or something?
He is the one from the other day.
What are we supposed to do?
Is collecting information still our top priority?
You defibrillated your own heart with electricity.
I am through with you, Yin.
What kind of light is this?
Maiden, black night, mourning in sadness,
The moon that accompanies her radiates of silver,
as the night of atonement quietly passes by.
I heard you ran into trouble with a doll.
I will not make an issue out of this since there was not any harm done.
It is been assumed that the contractors you disposed of were from the FSB.
If they had received the information, you would already be...
No, I have only started to get the feel of using it.
Do not let your emotions get the best of you.
There was no doubt it was him, so I tried to start a conversation.
He looked at me as if he never saw me before.
It might have been his way of saying you should forget about it.
He is probably worried that it might become a well-known scandal.
He looked strange, as if his memory was erased.
She was back at the tobacco shop.
Did those two not get along?
Well, there is no point in prying into a private matter.
We received our payment, and you even went to the hot spring.
Well, I did not have much of a choice after you deserted me, did I?
You did not have a choice?
Any reasonable person would have come back after finding out they have been deserted!
Well, everyone was looking forward to it.
There is no reason for you to be caught up in your past anymore.
It is up to you to decide
whether you want to remain here as Yin or be someone else.
Are you okay with this, Yin?
The sun shines a somber glitter as the hag sings.
The recurring destruction is a requiem for the lost past.
Is the remuneration for betrayal blood or tears?
The chain reaction of indignation has started and cannot be stopped.
The town is full of chaos and dissonance.
Episode Fifteen Memories of Betrayal in an Amber Smile... (Part One)
